about_the_game:
PixelPop 2087

The neon-soaked chaos of PixelPop 2087 will guide you in a 2D pixel art adventure where '80s nostalgia meets a dystopian twist from the future!
Set in the retro-futuristic year 2087, this indie gem combines synthwave vibes, explosive action, and quirky storytelling to deliver a cool gaming experience.

The Story

When your partner (who have rare red eyes) gets kidnapped by a shadowy sorcerer with a bizarre obsession for resurrecting forgotten monsters from '80s video games, it’s up to YOU to save the day. These monsters were deleted for being too buggy or just plain weird—and now they’re back, wreaking havoc across the city. Armed with pixel-perfect reflexes, a dash of sarcasm, and some seriously rad gear, you'll embark on a journey through neon-lit alleys, arcades-turned-deathtraps, and surreal, glitchy battlefields.

Pick your hero (male or female), crank up the synthwave soundtrack, and prepare to fight your way through a rogues' gallery of pixelated nightmares. It’s not just a rescue mission—it’s a quest to stop the dark wizard's absurd plan and restore balance to a world that never stopped loving the '80s.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or equivalent
  • Storage: 500 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 or equivalent
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated
